name: Louis Vuitton
description: French luxury fashion house known for its iconic monogram canvas and leather goods. Founded in 1854, it's one of the world's leading international fashion houses.

name: Gucci
description: Italian luxury fashion house known for its distinctive designs and iconic double G logo. Founded in Florence in 1921, Gucci has become synonymous with Italian craftsmanship.

name: Rolex
description: Swiss luxury watchmaker renowned for precision and status. Founded in 1905, Rolex has been at the forefront of watchmaking innovation and craftsmanship.

name: Hermès
description: French luxury goods manufacturer specializing in leather, lifestyle accessories, perfumery, and ready-to-wear. Founded in 1837, Hermès is known for its Birkin and Kelly bags.

location.address: 24 Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré, 75008 Paris, France

name: Chanel
description: French luxury fashion house focusing on haute couture, ready-to-wear, handbags, perfumery, and cosmetics. Founded by Coco Chanel in 1910, known for the iconic Chanel No. 5.

name: Prada
description: Italian luxury fashion house specializing in leather handbags, travel accessories, shoes, ready-to-wear, perfumes and other fashion accessories. Founded in 1913 in Milan.

location.address: Via Antonio Fogazzaro, 28, 20135 Milano MI, Italy

name: Cartier
description: French luxury goods conglomerate known for designing, manufacturing, and selling jewelry and watches. Founded in 1847, Cartier is often referred to as 'the jeweler of kings'.

location.address: 13 Rue de la Paix, 75002 Paris, France

name: Burberry
description: British luxury fashion house known for its distinctive tartan pattern and trench coats. Founded in 1856, Burberry represents classic British style and craftsmanship.

location.address: Horseferry House, London SW1P 2AW, United Kingdom
